name: git-workspace-mcp-extension
description: Git Workspace MCP Extension - Provides intelligent file operations and Git read-only access for AI assistants

scripts.install-deps: echo '🚀 Installing Git Workspace MCP Extension dependencies...' && npm install
scripts.build: echo '🔨 Building extension...' && npm run validate && echo '✅ Build complete!'
scripts.validate: echo '🔍 Validating manifest.json...' && node -e "JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('manifest.json', 'utf8')); console.log('✅ Manifest is valid JSON')"
scripts.dev: echo '🚀 Starting development server...' && node server/index.js
echo '🚀 Starting development server...' && node server/index.js
scripts.inspect: echo '🔍 Starting MCP Inspector...' && npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector node server/index.js
scripts.package: echo '📦 Creating DXT package...' && npm run validate && zip -r git-workspace-v1.0.0.dxt manifest.json server/ node_modules/ package.json README.md LICENSE icon.svg CHANGELOG.md
scripts.package-win: echo '📦 Creating DXT package...' && npm run validate && powershell -Command "Compress-Archive -Path 'manifest.json','server','node_modules','package.json','README.md','LICENSE','icon.svg','CHANGELOG.md' -DestinationPath 'git-workspace-v1.0.0.dxt' -Force"
scripts.help: echo '📚 Available commands:' && echo '  npm run install-deps - Install dependencies' && echo '  npm run build        - Build extension' && echo '  npm run package      - Create .dxt file (Unix/macOS)' && echo '  npm run package-win  - Create .dxt file (Windows)' && echo '  npm run inspect      - Debug with MCP inspector' && echo '  npm run dev          - Run development server' && echo '  npm run setup        - Run installation script (Unix/macOS)' && echo '  npm run setup-win    - Run installation script (Windows)'
